ioformat.images

Class SegmentationIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • ioformat.images.SegmentationIO

  • public class SegmentationIO
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements the persistence of image segmentations.

      • getWidthAndHeight

        public int[] getWidthAndHeight()
        Get the width and height in an array, where the width comes first and the height follows.
        Returns:
        int[] of length 2, containing the width at index 0 and the height at index 1.
